code: import{JSBI}from'fomoswap-artio';import{useMemo}from'react';import{NEVER_RELOAD,useSingleCallResult}from'../state/multicall/hooks';import{useActiveWeb3React}from'./index';import{useSocksController}from'./useContract';export default function useSocksBalance(){const{account}=useActiveWeb3React();const socksContract=useSocksController();const{result}=useSingleCallResult(socksContract,'balanceOf',[account!==null&&account!==void 0?account:undefined],NEVER_RELOAD);const data=result===null||result===void 0?void 0:result[0];return data?JSBI.BigInt(data.toString()):undefined;}export function useHasSocks(){const balance=useSocksBalance();return useMemo(()=>balance&&JSBI.greaterThan(balance,JSBI.BigInt(0)),[balance]);}
